lyrics:
8 contributorsdream lyricsverse 1
dream when youre feeling blue
dream thats the thing to do
just watch the smoke rings rise in the air
youll find your share of memories there

verse 2
so dream when the day is through
dream and they might come true
things never are as bad as they seem
so dream dream dream

verse 3
dream when the day is through
dream and they might come true
for things never are as bad as they seem
so dream dream dreamyou might also likeembed
